Class SimpleCodeWriter

java.lang.Object
software.amazon.smithy.utils.AbstractCodeWriter<SimpleCodeWriter>
software.amazon.smithy.utils.SimpleCodeWriter
public class SimpleCodeWriter extends AbstractCodeWriter<SimpleCodeWriter>
Helper class for generating code.

This class is a general purpose implementation of AbstractCodeWriter.
